trans-unit.source: Represents an element that has a value within a specific range.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un elemento con un valore all'interno di un intervallo specifico.

trans-unit.source: A RangeBase control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> that can be set between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo RangeBase presenta un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>che può essere compreso tra il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RangeBase visually indicates its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il RangeBase indica visivamente la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the user can interactively set the value; in other cases, the value can be set only programmatically.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, l'utente può impostare in modo interattivo il valore. in altri casi, il valore può essere impostato solo a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, ma non la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore per essere aggiunto o sottratto il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>determina come viene utilizzata questa proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente fa clic il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>proprietà aumenta o diminuisce il valore della proprietà LargeChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> commands on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente richiama il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A>comandi su un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty>delle modifiche del dispositivo di scorrimento dal valore della proprietà LargeChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>non utilizza questa proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> to add to or subtract from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: <>*> Consente di aggiungere o sottrarre il <> </> *> del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the highest possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il massimo consentito <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>dell'elemento dell'intervallo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>Ignora i metadati di questa proprietà e imposta il valore predefinito 10.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>Ignora i metadati di questa proprietà e imposta il valore predefinito su 100.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sulle proprietà di dipendenza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Il più elevato possibile <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>dell'elemento dell'intervallo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> to provide a new <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> function.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoclassi di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>possibile utilizzare questo metodo per rispondere alla modifica della proprietà di valore anziché eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>per fornire un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>(funzione).</xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnValueChanged method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnValueChanged genera il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: When overriding OnValueChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s OnValueChanged method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di OnValueChanged in una classe derivata, assicurarsi di chiamare il metodo di OnValueChanged della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <> </> *> per essere aggiunto o sottratto il <> </> *> di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>determina come viene utilizzata questa proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of SmallChange.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente fa clic il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>proprietà aumenta o diminuisce il valore di SmallChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseSmall%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseSmall%2A> command on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of SmallChange.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente richiama il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseSmall%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseSmall%2A>comando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty>delle modifiche del dispositivo di scorrimento dal valore di SmallChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseSmall%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseSmall%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>non utilizza questa proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> to add to or subtract from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: <>*> Consente di aggiungere o sottrarre il <> </> *> del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Provides a string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una rappresentazione di stringa di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that provides the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce una stringa che fornisce i valori del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la rappresentazione di stringa di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'ampiezza corrente del controllo di intervallo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control visually indicates the Value property in some way.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>controllo indica visivamente la proprietà Value in qualche modo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the Value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, i controlli dispositivo di scorrimento e barra di scorrimento hanno una pratica sincronizzato con il valore del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta un valore a un numero è minore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>proprietà, il valore è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta valore su un numero che è maggiore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>proprietà, il valore è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: L'ampiezza corrente del controllo di intervallo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the range value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando cambia il valore di intervallo.
